constituent: discriminating, say, words, keitai, mouth, kazoo, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, fiesta
heisigStory: A person of discriminating intellect can tell the difference between mere kazoo-buzzing and words spoken wisely.
koohiiStory1: Words are difficult to discriminate/discern from sounds in the middle of a fiesta.
koohiiStory2: I have discriminating taste. I´d rather listen to the words of a lecture than attend a kazoo concert. (Picture some snobby guy in a tweed jacket turning up his nose at entering a loud raucous kazoo recital).
myStory: phân biệt. khác biệt. nói âm thanh giáo mác là sự phán biệt khó
words:
認識(にんしき): recognition, cognizance
良識(りょうしき): good sense
意識(いしき): consciousness, senses
常識(じょうしき): common sense
知識(ちしき): knowledge, information
標識(ひょうしき): sign, mark
